articles.description: Brazil manager Carlo Ancelotti is sentenced to a year in prison by a Spanish court for tax evasion - but he will not have to serve time in jail.

articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Iga Swiatek beats Liudmila Samsonova to reach semi-finals
